rows.label: tlk4542014202_msg0001
rows.name:
You were just trying to respect Nicc
and Jelved's feelings, weren't you?
I can understand your decision.

rows.label: tlk4542014202_msg0002
rows.name:
Nicc is a strong man. I'm sure he'll
be able to do all right for himself in
some other mercenary band.

rows.label: tlk4542014202_msg0003
rows.name:
As for Jelved... We'll just have to work
together as a village to help him forget
his thirst for revenge, little by little.
